/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their red and brown facades reflecting the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the cityscape.
